Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.concurrent

Interface SuspendableLock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SuspendableLock.NoOpLock, SuspendableLock.VertxLock
    public interface SuspendableLock
    A suspendable, cluster-wide lock.

      • noOpLock

        @NotNull
static SuspendableLock noOpLock()
        Obtains a lock that doesn't do anything.
        Returns:

      • lock

        @Suspendable
@NotNull
static SuspendableLock lock​(@NotNull
                            java.lang.String name,
                            long timeout)
        Obtains a lock using a Hazelcast cluster.
        Parameters:
        name - The unique identifier of this lock
        timeout - How long to wait for the lock. If the timeout is 0, the method waits indefinitely
        Returns:
        A lock that has been acquired.
        Throws:
        io.vertx.core.VertxException - with an inner cause of TimeoutException if the lock acquisition has timed out, otherwise the Hazelcast cluster experienced an error.

      • lock

        @Suspendable
@NotNull
static SuspendableLock lock​(java.lang.String name)

      • release

        @Suspendable
void release()

      • destroy

        @Suspendable
void destroy()
        Destroys the lock, freeing up the resources it used in the cluster.
